name: Orog
description: Orogs are elite orcs bred for battle. They are stronger, smarter, and more disciplined than regular orcs, often serving as commanders in orcish armies. Orogs are known for their tactical prowess and ability to wield heavy weapons with ease. They are highly respected in orc society for their combat abilities and leadership skills.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Orc, and one additional language of your choice.
special: Weapon Mastery: You gain proficiency with heavy weapons, and you can wield two-handed weapons with one hand.
